alert.note: Alert for Barton; Jasper (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 8:58PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN CHEROKEE... CRAWFORD...SOUTHWESTERN BARTON AND NORTHWESTERN JASPER COUNTIES THROUGH 930 PM CDT... At 858 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Girard, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Pittsburg, Prairie State Park, Frontenac, Girard, Arma, Cherokee, Weir, Chicopee, Nashville, Mindenmines, Franklin, Walnut, Asbury, Beulah, Opolis, Greenbush, Yale, Ringo, Lone Oak and Brazilton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern Kansas...and southwestern Missouri.
